sense.def:
Izraz
national
se uporablja za stvari, ki se nanašajo na celotno državo, ne le na en njen del.

seg.quote: It made the headlines in the national newspapers.
Should housing policy be decided nationally or locally?

sense.def:
Izraz
national
se uporablja tudi za stvari, ki so značilne za prebivalce neke države.

seg.quote: Common sense is a national characteristic.

sense.def:
A national of a country
je državljan neke države, kadar biva v drugi državi.

seg.quote: Much of the workforce was made up of foreign nationals.
